input_intro.title: NATO Phonetic Alphabet & Numbers
input_intro.intro_en: Now that you've warmed up, let's learn the full NATO Phonetic Alphabet and numbers. We use them to spell ship names, call signs, MMSI, and channel numbers.
input_intro.intro_id: Sekarang setelah pemanasan, mari kita pelajari Alfabet Fonetik NATO dan angka lengkap. Kita menggunakannya untuk mengeja nama kapal, tanda panggilan, MMSI, dan nomor saluran.

input_mmsi.title: Example: MMSI Number
input_mmsi.instruction_en: Listen to the MMSI numbers carefully. Repeat them aloud, digit by digit.
input_mmsi.instruction_id: Dengarkan nomor MMSI dengan saksama. Ulangi dengan suara keras, angka demi angka.
input_mmsi.default_feedback: Great! You repeated the MMSI clearly.

input_vhf.title: Mini Dialogue: VHF Exchange
input_vhf.dialogue_en:
Operator A (Ray): “This is MV ANTARA, Call Sign Alpha – Bravo – Charlie – WUN. Radio check, over.”
Operator B (Lina): “Roger, MV ANTARA. Switch to Channel WUN SIX.”
input_vhf.dialogue_id:
Operator A (Ray): “Ini MV ANTARA, tanda panggilan Alpha – Bravo – Charlie – WUN. Periksa radio, over.”
Operator B (Lina): “Roger, MV ANTARA. Pindah ke Saluran WUN SIX.”
input_vhf.instruction_en: Listen to the dialogue carefully. Then, repeat Operator B's response aloud.
input_vhf.quiz_question: Who said 'Switch to Channel WUN SIX'?
input_vhf.default_feedback: Good job! Keep practicing to sound like a real sailor.

input_wrapup.title: Input Wrap-up
input_wrapup.intro_en: Great work! Now you know the full alphabet and numbers, and how they are used for ship names, call signs, MMSI, and radio channels. You’ll see numbers again in later units, like time, weather, and sea reports.
input_wrapup.intro_id: Kerja bagus! Sekarang kalian sudah mengetahui alfabet dan angka lengkap, serta bagaimana cara menggunakannya untuk nama kapal, tanda panggilan, MMSI, dan saluran radio. Kalian akan menemui angka lagi di unit-unit selanjutnya, seperti waktu, cuaca, dan laporan pelayaran.

noticing_intro.title: Noticing: Differences in Pronunciation
noticing_intro.intro_en: Now let’s look more closely at the alphabet and numbers. Some of them sound different in Maritime English. Listen and compare.
noticing_intro.intro_id: Sekarang mari kita lihat lebih dekat alfabet dan angka. Beberapa bunyinya berbeda dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim. Dengarkan dan bandingkan.

noticing_alphabet.title: Alphabet Differences
noticing_alphabet.instruction_en: Click each pair to hear the difference.
noticing_alphabet.instruction_id: Klik setiap pasangan untuk mendengar perbedaannya.

noticing_numbers.title: Number Differences
noticing_numbers.instruction_en: Click each pair to hear the difference. Pay special attention to 3, 5, and 9.
noticing_numbers.instruction_id: Klik setiap pasangan untuk mendengar perbedaannya. Perhatikan secara khusus angka 3, 5, dan 9.
noticing_numbers.feedback_text_id: Bagus sekali! Kamu sudah memperhatikan perbedaannya.
noticing_numbers.captain_tip_en: We change the pronunciation to avoid mistakes. For example, 'Nine' sounds like 'Five' on the radio, so we say 'Niner'.
noticing_numbers.captain_tip_id: Kita mengubah pengucapan untuk menghindari kesalahan. Misalnya, 'Nine' terdengar mirip dengan 'Five' di radio, jadi kita mengatakan 'Niner'.

noticing_wrapup.title: Noticing Wrap-up
noticing_wrapup.text_en: Great! You have noticed the differences in how we say letters and numbers at sea. These small changes make communication clear and safe.
noticing_wrapup.text_id: Bagus sekali! Kalian sudah memperhatikan perbedaan cara kita menyebut huruf dan angka di laut. Perubahan kecil ini membuat komunikasi lebih jelas dan aman.

controlled_practice_intro.title: Controlled Practice: Exercises
controlled_practice_intro.instruction_en: Now it's your turn! Let's practice the alphabet and numbers step by step. Listen carefully and choose the correct answer.
controlled_practice_intro.instruction_id: Sekarang giliran kalian! Mari kita berlatih alfabet dan angka langkah demi langkah. Dengarkan dengan saksama dan pilih jawaban yang benar.

controlled_ex_1.title: Exercise 1: Listen & Choose (Alphabet)
controlled_ex_1.instruction_en: Listen and choose the correct letter.
controlled_ex_1.instruction_id: Dengarkan dan pilih huruf yang benar.

controlled_ex_2.title: Exercise 2: Listen & Choose (Numbers)
controlled_ex_2.instruction_en: Listen and choose the correct number.
controlled_ex_2.instruction_id: Dengarkan dan pilih angka yang benar.

controlled_ex_3.title: Exercise 3: Matching Letters to Code Words
controlled_ex_3.instruction_en: Listen to the audio and type the correct letter. Sometimes you will also see a letter — type the correct NATO code word for it.
controlled_ex_3.instruction_id: Dengarkan audio dan ketik huruf yang benar. Kadang kalian juga akan melihat huruf – ketik kata kode NATO yang sesuai.

controlled_ex_4.title: Exercise 4: Spelling Ship Names
controlled_ex_4.instruction_en: Spell the ship name using the NATO alphabet. Click the letters in the correct order.
controlled_ex_4.instruction_id: Eja nama kapal dengan menggunakan alfabet NATO. Klik huruf dalam urutan yang benar.

controlled_wrapup.title: Controlled Practice Wrap-up
controlled_wrapup.text_en: Well done! You’ve practiced spelling with the NATO alphabet and numbers. You can now spell ship names and codes clearly. Next, we’ll try using them in real communication tasks.
controlled_wrapup.text_id: Kerja bagus! Kalian sudah berlatih mengeja dengan alfabet dan angka NATO. Sekarang kalian bisa mengeja nama kapal dan kode dengan jelas. Selanjutnya, kita akan mencobanya dalam tugas komunikasi nyata.

guided_intro.title: Guided Practice: Communication Tasks
guided_intro.text_en: Now, let’s try real communication. I’ll guide you through short radio tasks. Listen first, then repeat or respond as instructed.
guided_intro.text_id: Sekarang mari kita coba komunikasi nyata. Saya akan memandu kalian melalui tugas radio singkat. Dengarkan dulu, lalu ulangi atau jawab sesuai instruksi.

guided_task_1.title: Task 1: Radio Check
guided_task_1.instruction_en: Listen to the exchange. Then, repeat OS Lina's response.
guided_task_1.instruction_id: Dengarkan percakapan. Lalu, ulangi jawaban OS Lina.
guided_task_1.dialogue_en:
Captain Ray: “This is MV ANTARA, Call Sign Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. Radio check, over.”
OS Lina: “Roger, MV ANTARA. Loud and clear.”
guided_task_1.dialogue_id:
Captain Ray: “Ini MV ANTARA, tanda panggilan Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. Periksa radio, over.”
OS Lina: “Roger, MV ANTARA. Jelas.”
guided_task_1.feedback_try: Not clear enough. Listen again and repeat.

guided_task_2.title: Task 2: Spelling Ship Name
guided_task_2.example_spelling: Papa – Alpha – Charlie – India – Foxtrot – India – Charlie – Sierra – Tango – Alpha – Romeo
guided_task_2.instruction_en: Listen to the spelling. Then, try spelling another ship name by clicking the letters in the correct order.
guided_task_2.instruction_id: Dengarkan cara pengejaannya. Lalu, coba eja nama kapal lain dengan mengklik huruf dalam urutan yang benar.
guided_task_2.feedback_good: Well done! You spelled it clearly.
guided_task_2.feedback_try: Check again. Make sure the order is correct.

guided_task_3.title: Task 3: MMSI & Channel Number
guided_task_3.instruction_en: Listen to the example. Then, try spelling your own MMSI number and channel.
guided_task_3.instruction_id: Dengarkan contoh. Lalu, coba eja nomor MMSI dan saluran kalian sendiri.
guided_task_3.dialogue_en: Captain Ray: "Say your MMSI number and channel." OS Lina: "MMSI: Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fower – Fife – Six. Channel Wun Six."
guided_task_3.dialogue_id: Captain Ray: "Ucapkan nomor MMSI dan saluran kalian." OS Lina: "MMSI: Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fower – Fife – Six. Channel Wun Six."
guided_task_3.help_text: Type digits; the system will generate the radio pronunciation. Click the small play icon to hear each output.

guided_task_4.title: Task 4: Mini Dialogue — Distress Message
guided_task_4.instruction_en: Listen carefully to the distress message. Then, repeat the key information: ship name, call sign, MMSI, and emergency type.
guided_task_4.instruction_id: Dengarkan dengan saksama pesan darurat. Lalu, ulangi informasi penting: nama kapal, tanda panggilan, MMSI, dan jenis keadaan darurat.
guided_task_4.dialogue_en: OS Lina: "Mayday, Mayday, Mayday. This is MV ANTARA, Call Sign Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. MMSI Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fower – Fife – Six. Position: 10° South, 123° East. Fire in engine room. Request immediate assistance. Over." Captain Ray: "Roger, MV ANTARA. Assistance on the way."
guided_task_4.dialogue_id: OS Lina: "Mayday, Mayday, Mayday. Ini MV ANTARA, tanda panggilan Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. MMSI Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fower – Fife – Six. Posisi: 10° S, 123° E. Kebakaran di ruang mesin. Minta bantuan segera. Over." Captain Ray: "Roger, MV ANTARA. Bantuan sedang dalam perjalanan."
guided_task_4.feedback_good: Clear and precise. Well done, cadet!

guided_wrapup.title: Guided Practice Wrap-up
guided_wrapup.text_en: Well done, cadets! You’ve completed guided practice. You can now spell ship names, MMSI, and channel numbers, and even send a short distress message. In the next section, you’ll practice on your own.
guided_wrapup.text_id: Kerja bagus, kadet! Kalian telah menyelesaikan latihan terbimbing. Sekarang kalian bisa mengeja nama kapal, MMSI, dan nomor saluran, bahkan mengirim pesan darurat singkat. Pada bagian berikutnya, kalian akan berlatih sendiri.

authentic_intro.title: Authentic Task: Radio Communication Simulation
authentic_intro.text_en: Now it’s time to try a real-life simulation. You will act as the radio operator. Follow the prompts and communicate clearly using the NATO alphabet and numbers.
authentic_intro.text_id: Sekarang saatnya mencoba simulasi nyata. Kalian akan berperan sebagai operator radio. Ikuti instruksi dan berkomunikasilah dengan jelas menggunakan alfabet dan angka NATO.
authentic_intro.instruction_en: Click Start Simulation to begin. You will hear a scenario and need to respond aloud.
authentic_intro.instruction_id: Klik Mulai Simulasi untuk memulai. Kalian akan mendengar sebuah skenario dan harus merespons dengan suara keras.

authentic_task_1.title: Simulation Task 1: Radio Check
authentic_task_1.scenario_en: You are the radio operator on MV ANTARA. Captain asks you to respond to a radio check.
authentic_task_1.scenario_id: Kamu adalah operator radio di MV ANTARA. Kapten memintamu untuk merespons pemeriksaan radio.
authentic_task_1.dialogue_en: Captain Ray: “This is MV ANTARA, Call Sign Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. Radio check, over.”
authentic_task_1.dialogue_id: Captain Ray: “Ini MV ANTARA, tanda panggilan Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha. Pemeriksaan radio, over.”
authentic_task_1.instruction_en: Speak aloud: 'Roger, MV ANTARA. Loud and clear.'
authentic_task_1.instruction_id: Ucapkan dengan suara keras: 'Roger, MV ANTARA. Loud and clear.'
authentic_task_1.feedback_try_en: Not clear enough. Try again with a stronger voice.

authentic_task_2.title: Simulation Task 2: Spelling Ship Name
authentic_task_2.scenario_en: You are asked to spell your ship name to the port authority.
authentic_task_2.scenario_id: Kamu diminta mengeja nama kapalmu kepada otoritas pelabuhan.
authentic_task_2.dialogue_en: Captain Ray: “Please spell your ship name.” Your Task: “PACIFIC STAR → Papa – Alpha – Charlie – India – Foxtrot – India – Charlie – Sierra – Tango – Alpha – Romeo.”
authentic_task_2.dialogue_id: Captain Ray: “Tolong eja nama kapal Anda.” Tugas Anda: “PACIFIC STAR → Papa – Alpha – Charlie – India – Foxtrot – India – Charlie – Sierra – Tango – Alpha – Romeo.”
authentic_task_2.instruction_en: Speak aloud and spell the ship name clearly, letter by letter.
authentic_task_2.instruction_id: Ucapkan dengan suara keras dan eja nama kapal dengan jelas, huruf demi huruf.

authentic_task_3.title: Simulation Task 3: MMSI & Channel
authentic_task_3.scenario_en: You are asked to state your ship's MMSI number and working channel.
authentic_task_3.scenario_id: Kamu diminta menyebutkan nomor MMSI kapalmu dan saluran kerja.
authentic_task_3.dialogue_en: Captain Ray: "State your MMSI and channel number." Your Task: "MMSI: Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fow-er – Fife – Six. Channel Wun Six."
authentic_task_3.dialogue_id: Captain Ray: "Sebutkan MMSI dan nomor saluran Anda." Tugas Anda: "MMSI: Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fow-er – Fife – Six. Channel Wun Six."
authentic_task_3.instruction_en: Speak aloud your MMSI and channel clearly.
authentic_task_3.instruction_id: Ucapkan dengan jelas nomor MMSI dan saluran.

authentic_task_4.title: Simulation Task 4: Distress Message
authentic_task_4.scenario_en: Your ship has an emergency. Send a distress message with ship name, call sign, MMSI, position, and type of emergency.
authentic_task_4.scenario_id: Kapalmu mengalami keadaan darurat. Kirim pesan darurat dengan nama kapal, tanda panggilan, MMSI, posisi, dan jenis keadaan darurat.
authentic_task_4.dialogue_en: OS Lina: “Mayday, Mayday, Mayday. This is MV ANTARA, Call Sign Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha, MMSI Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fow-er – Fife – Six. Position: 10° South, 123° East. Fire in engine room. Request immediate assistance. Over.”
authentic_task_4.dialogue_id: OS Lina: “Mayday, Mayday, Mayday. Ini MV ANTARA, tanda panggilan Alpha – November – Tango – Alpha – Romeo – Alpha, MMSI Fife – Too – Fife – Wun – Too – Tree – Fow-er – Fife – Six. Posisi: 10° Selatan, 123° Timur. Kebakaran di ruang mesin. Meminta bantuan segera. Over.”
authentic_task_4.instruction_en: Speak aloud and send your own distress message using the same structure.
authentic_task_4.instruction_id: Ucapkan dengan suara keras dan kirim pesan daruratmu sendiri dengan struktur yang sama.
authentic_task_4.default_feedback: Clear distress message. Well done, cadet.
authentic_task_4.feedback_good_en: Clear distress message. Well done, cadet.
authentic_task_4.feedback_try_en: Important info missing. Repeat with ship name, MMSI, and emergency type.
authentic_task_4.feedback_good_id: Pesan darurat jelas. Kerja bagus, kadet.
authentic_task_4.feedback_try_id: Informasi penting hilang. Ulangi dengan nama kapal, MMSI, dan jenis darurat.

authentic_wrapup.title: Authentic Task Wrap-up
authentic_wrapup.text_en: Excellent work, cadets! You’ve completed the full simulation: radio check, spelling ship names, stating MMSI & channels, and sending a distress message. These skills are vital for clear and safe communication at sea.
authentic_wrapup.text_id: Kerja bagus, kadet! Kalian telah menyelesaikan simulasi penuh: pemeriksaan radio, mengeja nama kapal, menyebutkan MMSI & saluran, serta mengirim pesan darurat. Keterampilan ini sangat penting untuk komunikasi yang jelas dan aman di laut.

assessment_intro.title: Assessment: Unit 1 Quiz
assessment_intro.text_en: It’s time to check what you’ve learned. This quiz will test your spelling of ship names, numbers, MMSI, and emergency communication. Don’t worry — just do your best!
assessment_intro.text_id: Sekarang saatnya mengecek apa yang sudah kalian pelajari. Kuis ini akan menguji kemampuan kalian dalam mengeja nama kapal, angka, MMSI, dan komunikasi darurat. Jangan khawatir — lakukan yang terbaik!
assessment_intro.instruction_en: Click [Start Quiz] to begin. Answer all questions carefully.
assessment_intro.instruction_id: Klik [Mulai Kuis] untuk memulai. Jawablah semua pertanyaan dengan saksama.

assessment_letters.title: Assessment: Letters Quiz
assessment_letters.feedback_incorrect_en: Not correct. The right answer is %s.
assessment_letters.feedback_incorrect_id: Tidak benar. Jawaban yang benar adalah %s.

questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 0 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 1 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.text_en: What is the correct pronunciation for the number 2 in Maritime English?
questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 2 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.text_en: What is the correct pronunciation for the number 3 in Maritime English?
questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 3 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 4 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.text_id: Apa pengucapan yang benar untuk angka 9 dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim?

questions.prompt_en: Spell the MMSI number {mmsi} using Maritime English.
questions.prompt_id: Eja nomor MMSI {mmsi} dengan Bahasa Inggris Maritim.

questions.prompt_en: What is the emergency channel number in Maritime Radio?
questions.prompt_id: Berapa nomor saluran darurat di Radio Maritim?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is commonly used for ship-to-ship communication?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang sering digunakan untuk komunikasi kapal-ke-kapal?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is reserved for digital selective calling (DSC)?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang dicadangkan untuk Digital Selective Calling (DSC)?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is used for port operations in many regions?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang digunakan untuk operasi pelabuhan di banyak wilayah?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel should you use to call for immediate assistance (distress)?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang harus digunakan untuk meminta bantuan segera (darurat)?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is commonly assigned for bridge-to-bridge navigation safety?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang biasanya digunakan untuk keselamatan navigasi bridge-to-bridge?

questions.prompt_en: Which VHF channel is typically used for calling harbor authorities?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran VHF mana yang biasanya digunakan untuk memanggil otoritas pelabuhan?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is used for safety broadcasts in some regions (note: varies by region)?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang digunakan untuk siaran keselamatan di beberapa wilayah (bervariasi)?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is reserved internationally for distress and safety calling?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang dicadangkan secara internasional untuk panggilan darurat dan keselamatan?

questions.prompt_en: Which channel is used for DSC alerting, closely related to safety procedures?
questions.prompt_id: Saluran mana yang digunakan untuk alerting DSC, berhubungan dengan prosedur keselamatan?

questions.prompt_en: What phrase must be repeated three times to start a distress call?
questions.prompt_id: Frasa apa yang harus diulang tiga kali untuk memulai panggilan darurat?
questions.feedback_en: Correct! A distress call begins with 'Mayday, Mayday, Mayday.'
questions.feedback_id: Benar! Panggilan darurat dimulai dengan 'Mayday, Mayday, Mayday.'

questions.prompt_en: Which code word signals immediate assistance required (example selection)?
questions.prompt_id: Kode kata mana yang menandakan memerlukan bantuan segera?
questions.feedback_en: Mayday indicates distress needing immediate assistance.
questions.feedback_id: Mayday menunjukkan keadaan darurat yang membutuhkan bantuan segera.

questions.prompt_en: When giving position in a distress call, which format is preferred?
questions.prompt_id: Saat memberi posisi dalam panggilan darurat, format mana yang disukai?
questions.feedback_en: Latitude & Longitude is the preferred precise format.
questions.feedback_id: Lintang & Bujur adalah format yang lebih tepat.

questions.prompt_en: Which item is essential in a distress message?
questions.prompt_id: Item mana yang penting dalam pesan darurat?
questions.feedback_en: Correct — ship name is essential (plus call sign, MMSI, position, emergency).
questions.feedback_id: Benar — nama kapal adalah penting (bersama tanda panggilan, MMSI, posisi, jenis darurat).

questions.prompt_en: How many times should the ship's name be spoken for clarity in an urgent report?
questions.prompt_id: Berapa kali nama kapal harus disebut untuk kejelasan dalam laporan mendesak?
options: Repeat as needed, clearly once is standard
questions.feedback_en: Clear repetition is important; say the name clearly (standard: once, but repeat if needed).
questions.feedback_id: Pengulangan jelas penting; sebutkan nama dengan jelas (standar: sekali, ulangi jika perlu).

questions.prompt_en: Which phrase confirms you heard the distress message (acknowledgement)?
questions.prompt_id: Frasa mana yang mengonfirmasi kamu mendengar pesan darurat (acknowledgement)?
questions.feedback_en: Roger is commonly used to acknowledge receipt.
questions.feedback_id: Roger digunakan untuk mengonfirmasi penerimaan.

questions.prompt_en: What does 'Mayday relay' mean?
questions.prompt_id: Apa arti 'Mayday relay'?
questions.feedback_en: Correct — it's relaying another vessel's distress message.
questions.feedback_id: Benar — mengulangi/penerusan pesan darurat kapal lain.

questions.prompt_en: Which number word is used for the digit '5' in a distress broadcast?
questions.prompt_id: Kata angka apa yang digunakan untuk digit '5' dalam siaran darurat?
questions.feedback_en: In Maritime English '5' is pronounced 'Fife'.
questions.feedback_id: Dalam Bahasa Inggris Maritim '5' disebut 'Fife'.

questions.prompt_en: If you cannot contact authorities on VHF 16, what is recommended next?
questions.prompt_id: Jika tidak bisa menghubungi otoritas di VHF 16, apa yang direkomendasikan selanjutnya?
options: Try DSC or other working channel and relay
Broadcast continuously on the same channel forever
questions.feedback_en: Try DSC or another working channel and attempt to relay the distress via other means.
questions.feedback_id: Coba DSC atau saluran kerja lain dan usahakan meneruskan pesan darurat melalui cara lain.

questions.prompt_en: Which detail is NOT necessary in the initial distress call?
questions.prompt_id: Detail mana yang TIDAK perlu dalam panggilan darurat awal?
questions.feedback_en: Full passenger manifest is not required initially; prioritize critical info (name, position, MMSI, emergency).
questions.feedback_id: Daftar penumpang lengkap tidak perlu pada awalnya; prioritaskan info kritis (nama, posisi, MMSI, darurat).

questions.prompt_en: Spell the call sign ABC1 using the NATO alphabet.
questions.prompt_id: Eja tanda panggilan ABC1 dengan alfabet NATO.
questions.feedback_en: Correct! ABC1 = Alpha – Bravo – Charlie – Wun.
questions.feedback_id: Benar! ABC1 = Alpha – Bravo – Charlie – Wun.

questions.prompt_en: Spell the call sign MVX7.
questions.prompt_id: Eja tanda panggilan MVX7.

questions.prompt_en: Scenario 6: Medical emergency on board. Provide ship name, MMSI, and nature of emergency.

questions.prompt_id: Skenario 7: Melihat kapal lain tenggelam. Kirim Mayday termasuk posisi dan detail singkat.

questions.prompt_en: Scenario 9: Fire in cargo hold with smoke. Include ship name, call sign, and brief emergency type.
questions.prompt_id: Skenario 9: Kebakaran di ruang kargo dengan asap. Sertakan nama kapal, tanda panggilan, dan jenis darurat singkat.

questions.prompt_en: Scenario 10: Final: Compose a full distress message including Ship Name, Call Sign, MMSI, Position, and Type of Emergency.
